entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Port Elgin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 09:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: NE 26 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
